page.title: 09THE HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: I have been watching the Health Centre for the past few months and I think it is getting on well .In August 1984 it was only a few bricks .In December it was a bit bigger .Now it is full sized .I took pictures of it ,our teacher took slides of it .Now we are getting to the roof .First there was nothing then there was pieces of wood .Now the tiles are getting put on ,one roof is finished ,now they have to fill in the other roof ,put windows ,doors in and the new site agent hopes to finish in September .The health centre is in the middle of a busy shopping area with houses for old people at the back and surrounded by other blocks of houses .Near at hand a pharmacy is being built and a short distance away are the primary schools ,the community centre and a bus garage .
